What is Billing Boss?

Billing Boss is a free online invoicing tool designed for small businesses and freelancers to create, send and track the status of invoices. It's so simple to use that you can create and send your first invoice within minutes.

A simple invoicing solution

You don't need any accounting experience to run Billing Boss because it isn't an online accounting application. We've kept in simple on purpose, so you can get organized and get the job done fast. With our billing solution, you can easily create and send invoices while being able to see the customers that have paid and those who still owes you money. Spending less time on billing and tracking down payments, means that you have more time to focus on your business.

Close Topic

Why Billing Boss is Free

Billing Boss is here to help you meet your number 1 need (getting paid quickly and easily). It has to be free – after all, you can easily write invoices by hand in Word or struggle with an ugly spreadsheet. Where we will make money is when we solve harder problems for you. We're currently working on some exciting services to help you grow your business. Stay tuned as we'll be announcing them in the coming months.

Close Topic

Accepting Online Payments

Get your invoices paid an average of 2 weeks faster by accepting online payments through Billing Boss.

If you have a merchant account through Sage Payment Services, Beanstream, or if you have a PayPal account, when you email your customer an invoice, they can pay your invoice online immediately.

Close Topic

Sharing your data

While other online invoicing tools do not allow you to easily share your data, Billing Boss allows you to securely grant your accountant or bookkeeper access to your invoices, without having to transfer files back and forth.

Since you can see everything online, your workflow and communication between you and your accountant or bookkeeper will be faster, more efficient and more accurate.

Close Topic

Access from anywhere

Because Billing Boss is an online application, there is no software to download and you're not tied to your home computer. You can access Billing Boss 24/7 through any internet connection - even if you are traveling, as long as you have access to a computer, you can send your customers an invoice.

Close Topic

Look Professional - fast

There's no need to spend time designing an invoice template with Billing Boss. We've done the work for you - just add your business information and you have a professionally designed invoice template that is ready to use over and over.

Our purpose is to help our customers run their businesses more effectively, helping them to gain greater insight into their business activities and providing them with lasting benefits by automating their business processes

Get Organized and Stay Organized

With Billing Boss, all of your invoices are stored in one place for easy access. You'll be able to quickly see how much you've billed out, what is paid and which invoices are overdue.
